snippet: The Tibetan spiritual leader attended a gathering of Nobel Peace Prize laureates in Rome, but the Vatican said Francis would not meet any of them.
abstract: Pope Francis reportedly refuses to meet with Dalai Lama, who is in Rome for gathering of Nobel Peace Prize laureates; pope's action seems to be further success for China in its efforts to isolate the exiled Tibetan spiritual leader, but Vatican claims Pope Francis will not meet with any of the Nobel laureates and says Dalai Lama is held in high esteem.
lead_paragraph: The Tibetan spiritual leader attended a gathering of Nobel Peace Prize laureates in Rome, but the Vatican said Francis would not meet any of them.

headline.main: Pope Declines to Meet With Dalai Lama
headline.print_headline: Pope Declines to Meet With Dalai Lama
